name: Raymond's Obstacle Course
description: Raymond's Obstacle Course is a multi-stage 3D, first-person platformer. Your goal is to reach the end of each stage by successfully navigating across all obstacles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
